name: Necrichor
condition_immunities: blinded, charmed, deafened, exhaustion, frightened, grappled, paralyzed, poisoned, prone, restrained

traits.Legendary Resistance (2/Day): If the necrichor fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.
traits.Rejuvenation: Unless its lifeless remains are splashed with holy water or placed in a vessel under the effects of the hallow spell, the destroyed necrichor re-forms in 1d10 days, regaining all its hits points and appearing in the place it died or in the nearest unoccupied space.
traits.Spider Climb: The necrichor can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.
traits.Unusual Nature: The necrichor doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.
